scripts.build: npm run -w @privacy-pact/types build && npm run -w @privacy-pact/server build && npm run -w @privacy-pact/adapter-prisma build && npm run -w @privacy-pact/client build
scripts.test:all: npm run -w @privacy-pact/server test && npm run -w @privacy-pact/adapter-prisma test && npm run -w @privacy-pact/client test && (cd examples/express-app && npm test)
scripts.test: echo "Run individual package tests with npm run -w <package> test"
